DOC.brief_summary: The primary endpoint study investigate effect add nalbuphine intrathecal morphine quality postoperative analgesia Morphine related side effect post- cesarean delivery .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Adding Nalbuphine Intrathecal Morphine Analgesic Efficacy Side Effects After Cesarean Section
DOC.detailed_description: The study perform Assiut University Hospitals , obtain approval local ethic committee write informed patient consent . All patient peripheral IV cannula 18 G insert ; standard non-invasive monitor apply . All patient preloaded 10 ml/kg Ringer 's lactate solution intravenous . Intrathecal block strict aseptic condition perform sit position L3-4 L4-5 inter-spinous space 25G pencil-point spinal needle . All patient receive intrathecal 10 mg 0.5 % hyperbaric bupivacaine .
DOC.criteria: Female patient age 16 40 year ASA physical status I II Infection site injection . Coagulopathy bleed diathesis . Preexisting neurologic deficit . History hypersensitivity give drug . Inability communicate investigator hospital staff . History chronic opioid u
